channel.title: Co-hosts on Podcast of Engineers
channel.description: Recent content in Co-hosts on Podcast of Engineers

item.title: Chaofan Cai
item.description: Hi, my name is Chaofan Cai, graduated from ZJU with a major in Electrical Engineering. I’m glad to become a co-host of the podcast because I think it’s a good chance to raise my knowledge and expand my thinking.

item.title: Hongqian Wang
item.description: Hello everyone, I am a co-host and coordinator of this platform and a major student from UTSEUS. I love reading and believe that books are windows of knowledge through which I can continuously expand my horizons.

item.title: Ningning Chen
item.description: Hello, I’m Ningning Chen, graduated from the Information Engineering major at SHU, currently studying for a Master’s degree at SYSU. I highly cherish this opportunity to become a co-host, because it’s a good measure to broaden my horizon and meet experienced people.

item.title: Nuo Chen
item.description: Hi, I’m Nuo Chen. I am a student at UTSEUS and will be going to UTC to continue my studies. Maybe you’d like to chat about anything that interests you too, so join us.

item.title: Xiaoya Wang
item.description: Hi,my name is WangXiaoya.I am a student at UTSEUS, I love connecting with people.I find it very rewarding to share and listen to personal experiences and stories, which is why I became a co-host!

item.title: Yicong Li
item.description: Welcome to the podcast! I’m Yicong Li, a student at Shanghai University UTSEUS. Exciting news: I’m about to embark on a new adventure at UTC in France.

item.title: Yilin Yang
item.description: Welcome to the podcast! I’m Yicong Li, a student at Shanghai University UTSEUS. Exciting news: I’m about to embark on a new adventure at UTC in France.

item.title: Jack Wang
item.description: Hey guys, Jack Wang here! I’m a junior student in UTSEUS. As one of Mr.Lunde’s students, I’m so honored that I could contribute to the podcast project!

item.title: Kaixin Lu
item.description: Hello, my name is Kaixin Lu, and I am also one of the co-hosts of this site. I am now a student in UTSEUS and will go to Duke University for my graduate study.

item.title: Lunde Chen
item.description: Hi, I’m Lunde Chen. I’m an assistant professor in computer science at UTSEUS, Shanghai University. I enjoy listening to podcasts very much and that’s why I launched The Podcast of Engineers with my students, for which I am also a co-host.

item.title: Xinning Zhu
item.description: Hi everyone, I am one of the cohosts on this site, an information engineering student from UTSEUS who is responsible for interviewing guests and running the site.

item.title: Zhengqing Gong
item.description: Hello everyone, I’m Zhengqing GONG, currently a UTC student from UTSEUS, with a focus on the exciting realm of robotics and intelligent systems.

item.title: Zikang Chen
item.description: Hi! My name is Zikang. I’m currently pursuing my engineering master’s degree in engineering in France, following my graduation from UTSEUS, Shanghai University, where I was honored with the Principal’s Scholarship, placing me in the top 0.
